list_definition.definition: to crush into powder or small pieces

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Grind the spices in a pestle and mortar

list_definition.definition: to rub together, usually producing an unpleasant noise
to rub into or against something else

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He ground his heel into the earth.

list_definition.mean_english: công việc cực nhọc đều đều

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Learning irregular verbs is a bit of a grind.

list_ex_of_english: The remaining part of the body was ground in a small bowl with physiological saline.
